name: CKEDITOR.dom.iterator
doc:
Represents iterator class. It can be used to iterate over all elements (or even text nodes in case of enlargeBr set to false) which establish "paragraph-like" spaces within passed range.

// <h1>[foo</h1><p>bar]</p>
var iterator = range.createIterator();
iterator.getNextParagraph(); // h1 element
iterator.getNextParagraph(); // p element

// <ul><li>[foo</li><li>bar]</li>
// With enforceRealBlocks set to false iterator will return two list item elements.
// With enforceRealBlocks set to true iterator will return two paragraphs and the DOM will be changed to:
// <ul><li><p>foo</p></li><li><p>bar</p></li>

members.name: activeFilter
members.doc: Iterator's active filter. It is set by the getNextParagraph method when it enters nested editable.

members.name: enforceRealBlocks
members.doc: Whether iterator should create transformable block if the current one contains text and it cannot be transformed. For example new blocks will be established in elements like <li> or <td>.
members.short_doc:
Whether iterator should create transformable block
if the current one contains text and it cannot be transformed. ...

members.name: enlargeBr
members.doc: Whether include <br>s into the enlarged range. Should be set to false when using iterator in CKEDITOR.ENTER_BR mode.
members.short_doc: Whether include <br>s into the enlarged range. ...

members.name: filter
members.doc: Default iterator's filter. It is set only for nested iterators.

members.name: getNextParagraph
members.doc: Returns next paragraph-like element or null if reached the end of range.

params.name: blockTag
params.doc: Name of a block element which will be established by iterator in block-less elements (see enforceRealBlocks).

members.short_doc: Returns next paragraph-like element or null if reached the end of range. ...
